entries: You grew up in an untamed region of the Isle of Kortos, and you know how to survive in the wild.
Choose two ability boosts. One must be to Constitution or Wisdom, and one is a free ability boost.

You're trained in the {@skill Survival} skill and a {@skill Lore} skill related to the terrain type associated with your home region (such as {@skill Lore||Hills Lore} or {@skill Lore||Mountains Lore}). You gain the {@feat Survey Wildlife} skill feat.
